name: expense-sharing-system
description: 寝室费用分摊记账系统 - 完整部署版本

scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client && npm run install:admin
scripts.build:all: npm run build:client && npm run build:admin
scripts.build:client: cd Client\ application && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: cd Admin\ panel && npm run build
scripts.zeabur:deploy: npm run zeabur:init && npm run start:prod
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd Server-side && npm run dev" "cd Client\ application && npm run dev" "cd Admin\ panel && npm run dev"
